description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'retrieveSAAdditionalFields')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}A breakdown of income received that does not belong to any other income type.

totalOtherIncome.description: Total of all other income. Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between 0.00 and 99,999,999,999.99

postCessationIncome.description: A breakdown of income submitted after the relevant income source ceased.

totalPostCessationReceipts.description: Total income submitted after the relevant income source ceased. Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between 0.00 and 99,999,999,999.99

postCessationReceipts.description: A breakdown of those receipts submitted after the relevant income source ceased.

amount.description: Income submitted after the relevant income source ceased. Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between 0.00 and 99,999,999,999.99

taxYearIncomeToBeTaxed.description: Tax year of the submitted income. Expects this in the format YYY-YY (e.g. 2023-24 for the 23/24 tax year).
